import React from 'react' import './CheckoutItem.scss' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { clearItemFromCart } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' const CheckoutItem = ({cartItem: { name, imageUrl, price, quantity, id }, dispatch}) => (
{name} {quantity} {price}
dispatch(clearItemFromCart(id)) } className='remove-button'>✕
) const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => ({ remove: (id) => dispatch(clearItemFromCart(id)) }) export default connect(null, null)(CheckoutItem)
